resources.string: Make sure to spoof only in Google Photos.
In LSPosed, the module is by default only activated for Google Photos. If you want to use it in other apps, then keep this toggle OFF.
Pass false to hooked method for higher feature levels present in ROM if user selects a lower Pixel feature level. (Recommended)

Looks like the this app module is not enabled.
 Please enable it in LSPosed, then reboot.
 If already enabled, then just reboot. If that does not work, kindly uninstall and reinstall.

# Fix Custom feature flags selection not getting applied.
 # Option to export / import configs.
 # Added Advanced options -> Verbose logging.
Please force stop Google Photos to take effect.
Save or share your settings of this module with others.\n \"Save\" will prompt to select a location to export the settings as a JSON file.
This will open a system window to select the configuration file.
Read error! Make sure to select a proper file!
More debug information in LSPosed logs and Android logcat.\n To share logs, open LSPosed -> Logs -> top Save icon. Then share the created file.
Failed to stop package. Please stop manually.
Failed to launch. Please start manually.
